channel.title: Media Coverage of the New Release Date
channel.description:
So the thing is I thought we should have a thread where we share links with different news-sites commenting on black mesa's finally revealed release date.
I couldn't find a similiar thread and I apologize sincerely if one does already exist.
However, for me it's interesting to see what the different media writes about the topic, and I hope someone shares my interest. Well here we go, i'll post a couple of links and i'll hope other users here will expand the thread with more articles and such.

This is because the forum shortens the links for display purposes, (see all the …'s in the middle of the links), so if you copy them directly from the post, the code is wrong.
